data.message:
sorry, "Bill gates": Eminem is my idol and
will remain forever.
sorry, "C.M. Punk": Eminem is da "Best
In The World", not u.
sorry, "Sun": Eminem is much HOTTER
than u.
sorry, "Sheamus": Eminem is "The Great
White", not u.
sorry, "Undertaker": Eminem is da "Mr.
Big Evil", not u.
sorry, "Einstein": Eminem's rap speed
is much faster than speed of light.
sorry, "Pythagoras": Eminem is da most
difficult equation.
sorry, "Newton": Eminem is da one who
attracts, not Gravity.
sorry, "da Vinci" Eminem is more
beautiful than da Mona Lisa.
sorry "Edison:" Eminem is the light of
da world.
sorry, "Rome": all roads lead to Eminem.
